Title: Establishes the misdemeanors of unlawful publication of an intimate image of a minor in the first and second degrees
Summary: Establishes the misdemeanors of unlawful publication of an intimate image of a minor in the first and second degrees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crimes of unlawful publication of an intimate image of a minor in the first and second degrees
